pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ampoule - a process pool for Twisted, based on AMP==================================================Ampoule is a process pool written on top of[Twisted](https://twistedmatrix.com/). Its name comes from the use of[AMP](https://amp-protocol.net/) as the default communication protocol betweenthe pool and all its children.It provides an API very close to that of the built-in Twisted `ThreadPool`. Asan helper function it also provides a `deferToAMPProcess` function that createsthe `ProcessPool` and submits jobs to it.
